translation.Name: <color=mythical>Is that an earthquake?</color>
translation.Description: While making their way here, <color=legendary>Commander Barlow</color> and a few others felt a large quake in the ground. They thought it might have been the volcano erupting, but discovered a monsterous zombie. He wants you to travel to Keokea, but be careful, this thing tears up the ground and won't hesitate to throw it at you!
